Articles.Content:
**HUBBLE REPLICA**

This one was a quickie, there aren't nearly enough Hubbles on this forum. This one has custom solar panels, if you want them tilted you'll have to use the rotation gizmo in the VAB. A quick note- the shuttle in the second-to-last picture isn't mine, it's Inigma's fabulous replica, found [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/108219-STS-4-Space-Shuttle-%28Stock-NASA-Replica%29-New-Shuttle-Derived-Crafts%21-SDHLV-Ares%21-4-8-15). Also, say hello to Hubble's 25th anniversary! A quarter of a century of amazing discoveries.

**Craft Info:** 142 parts, 12.1 tons. It doesn't quite fit in a Mk3 cargo bay, but you could possibly put the solar panels and antenna on using KAS.

**Craft Download:** (Mediafire) [Link](https://www./?dpu9iat59956cfk)

And now for some beauty shots!

![S1u44Fk.png](http://i.imgur.com/S1u44Fk.png)

![8kSDscS.png](http://i.imgur.com/8kSDscS.png)

![4uN1Jnp.png](http://i.imgur.com/4uN1Jnp.png)

![IFjnqSg.png](http://i.imgur.com/IFjnqSg.png)

![Ws1v22Z.png](http://i.imgur.com/Ws1v22Z.png)

Thanks for viewing, and leave some rep if you enjoyed!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-11T15:56:03Z" title="04/11/2015 03:56  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 11, 2015</time> by Zucal**
  
Edited to reflect anniversary.
Very nice! It looks like the perfect scale! +rep
that's awesome got to love hubble

Wow. The scale is just perfect and beautiful.

Great work as always, Zucal! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Hi guy, nice build! Also, you are right in the fact that there aren't enough Hubble Builds on the Forum.
